body:
### intro
Despite tremendous advances in [chip manufacturing](http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/00/Transistor_Count_and_Moore%27s_Law_-_2011.svg), we are still far behind [expectations](http://mashable.com/2013/09/24/open-letter-to-science/).
As in farming [automation](./images/automation.jpg) liberated thousands of [people](./images/oldschoolfarming.jpg), [synthesis](https://excape.cis.upenn.edu/documents/vardi.pdf) should liberate thousands of [programmers](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Programmer).

I am researching reactive synthesis (sometimes [bounded](https://verify.iaik.tugraz.at/research/pub/Ausgewaehltekapitel/WebHome/bounded_synthesis.pdf) 
and 
[parameterized](https://verify.iaik.tugraz.at/research/pub/Ausgewaehltekapitel/WebHome/parameterized_synthesis.pdf)) while doing PhD at [TU Graz](www.iaik.tugraz.at). I don't work all the time -- sometimes we also play [games](http://www-verimag.imag.fr/~jobstman/teaching/Dagstuhl2011/3_safety.pdf).
